entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow at times. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Sunday 23 April 2023
